text: yeoseong-gwa dongchimhagijeon ttoneun yeoseong-ege jichamgeum-eul gyeoljeonghagi jeon-eneun-ihon-eul hayeodo joeag-i anina geu nyeodeul-ege habdanghan seonmul-eul hala bu yuhan janeun buyuhandaelo gananhan ja neun gananhan daelo jagiui neunglyeog-e tta leudoe habdanghan seonmul-eun uiloun jadeul e daehan uimula
